languages.text: {n}Гемункулы, которых вы видите, молчат, но вы все равно слышите ответ Тервантьяса — его голос будто бы звучит со всех сторон.{/n} "Моя новая множественная форма интригует, не правда ли? Оставлю твой вопрос без ответа, образец, чтобы тебе было о чем поразмыслить".

traits.locale_text: {n}Гемункулы, которых вы видите, молчат, но вы все равно слышите ответ Тервантьяса — его голос будто бы звучит со всех сторон.{/n} "Моя новая множественная форма интригует, не правда ли? Оставлю твой вопрос без ответа, образец, чтобы тебе было о чем поразмыслить".
traits.speaker: Haemonculus

languages.text: {n}The Haemonculi you can see are silent, and yet, you still hear Tervantias's reply: his voice seems to be coming from every direction at once.{/n} "My new multiple form is intriguing, isn't it? I'll leave your question unanswered, specimen, to give you something to ponder."
languages.original_text: {n}Гемункулы, которых вы видите, молчат, но вы все равно слышите ответ Тервантьяса — его голос будто бы звучит со всех сторон.{/n} "Моя новая множественная форма интригует, не правда ли? Оставлю твой вопрос без ответа, образец, чтобы тебе было о чем поразмыслить".

traits.locale_text: {n}The Haemonculi you can see are silent, yet you still hear Tervantias's reply: his voice seems to be coming from every side at once.{/n} "My new multiple form is intriguing, isn't it? I'll leave your question unanswered, specimen, to give you something to think about."
traits.speaker: Haemonculus

traits.locale_text: {n}The Haemonculi you can see are silent, and yet, you still hear Tervantias's reply: his voice seems to be coming from every direction at once.{/n} "My new multiple form is intriguing, isn't it? I'll leave your question unanswered, specimen, to give you something to ponder."
traits.speaker: Haemonculus

languages.text: {n}所有的血伶人都沉默下来，最后终于开了口，他的声音似乎同时从四面八方传来。{/n}“这种新的多重身体真是很有趣，你说呢？我就不回答你这个问题了，实验对象，你可以好好思考思考。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Haemonculi you can see are silent, and yet, you still hear Tervantias's reply: his voice seems to be coming from every direction at once.{/n} "My new multiple form is intriguing, isn't it? I'll leave your question unanswered, specimen, to give you something to ponder."

traits.locale_text: {n}所有的血伶人都沉默下来，最后终于开了口，他的声音似乎同时从四面八方传来。{/n}“这种新的多重身体真是很有趣，你说呢？我就不回答你这个问题了，实验对象，你可以好好思考思考。”
traits.speaker: Haemonculus

languages.text: {n}Die Haemonculi, die du sehen kannst, sind stumm, und doch hörst du Tervantias' Antwort. Seine Stimme scheint von allen Seiten gleichzeitig zu kommen.{/n} "Meine neue vielfache Gestalt ist faszinierend, nicht wahr? Ich lasse Eure Frage unbeantwortet, Versuchsstück, um Euch etwas zum Nachdenken zu geben."
languages.original_text: {n}The Haemonculi you can see are silent, and yet, you still hear Tervantias's reply: his voice seems to be coming from every direction at once.{/n} "My new multiple form is intriguing, isn't it? I'll leave your question unanswered, specimen, to give you something to ponder."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Haemonculi, die du sehen kannst, sind stumm, und doch hörst du Tervantias' Antwort. Seine Stimme scheint von allen Seiten gleichzeitig zu kommen.{/n} "Meine neue vielfache Gestalt ist faszinierend, nicht wahr? Ich lasse Eure Frage unbeantwortet, Versuchsstück, um Euch etwas zum Nachdenken zu geben."
traits.speaker: Haemonculus

languages.text: {n}El hemónculo al que puedes ver está callado, y aun así oyes la voz de Tervantias, que parece provenir de todas las direcciones a la vez.{/n} «Mi nueva forma colectiva es intrigante, ¿verdad? Dejaré tu pregunta sin respuesta, espécimen, para darte algo en lo que pensar».
languages.original_text: {n}The Haemonculi you can see are silent, and yet, you still hear Tervantias's reply: his voice seems to be coming from every direction at once.{/n} "My new multiple form is intriguing, isn't it? I'll leave your question unanswered, specimen, to give you something to ponder."

traits.locale_text: {n}El hemónculo al que puedes ver está callado, y aun así oyes la voz de Tervantias, que parece provenir de todas partes a la vez.{/n} «Mi nueva forma colectiva es intrigante, ¿verdad? Dejaré tu pregunta sin respuesta, espécimen, para darte algo en lo que pensar».
traits.speaker: Haemonculus

languages.text: {n}Bien que les hémoncules devant vous gardent le silence, vous entendez la réponse de Tervantias, comme si sa voix venait de partout à la fois.{/n} « Ma nouvelle forme multiple vous intrigue ? Je ne répondrai pas à votre question, spécimen, pour vous donner matière à réflexion. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Haemonculi you can see are silent, and yet, you still hear Tervantias's reply: his voice seems to be coming from every direction at once.{/n} "My new multiple form is intriguing, isn't it? I'll leave your question unanswered, specimen, to give you something to ponder."

traits.locale_text: {n}Bien que les hémoncules devant vous gardent le silence, vous entendez la réponse de Tervantias, comme si sa voix venait de partout à la fois.{/n} « Ma nouvelle forme multiple vous intrigue ? Je ne répondrai pas à votre question, spécimen, pour vous donner matière à réflexion. »
traits.speaker: Haemonculus

languages.text: {n}あなたに見えるハモンキュラスは沈黙しているが、それでもあなたはテルヴァンティアスの返答を聞く。彼の声は一度にすべての方角から聞こえるようだ。{/n}「私の新たな複数形態は面白いだろう？お前の質問には答えないままでいよう、標本よ。お前にあれこれ考えること与える」
languages.original_text: {n}The Haemonculi you can see are silent, and yet, you still hear Tervantias's reply: his voice seems to be coming from every direction at once.{/n} "My new multiple form is intriguing, isn't it? I'll leave your question unanswered, specimen, to give you something to ponder."

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたに見えるハモンキュラスは沈黙しているが、それでもあなたはテルヴァンティアスの返答を聞く。彼の声は一度にすべての方角から聞こえるようだ。{/n}「私の新たな複数形態は面白いだろう？お前の質問には答えないままでいよう、標本よ。お前にあれこれ考えること与える」
traits.speaker: Haemonculus

languages.text: {n}Görebildiğin Haimonkuluslar konuşmuyor ama Tervantias'ın cevabını yine de duyuyorsun. Sesi aynı anda her yönden geliyormuş gibi hissediyorsun.{/n} "Yeni, çoklu formum ne enteresan, değil mi? Soruna cevap vermiyorum numune. Düşün, kendin bul."
languages.original_text: {n}The Haemonculi you can see are silent, and yet, you still hear Tervantias's reply: his voice seems to be coming from every direction at once.{/n} "My new multiple form is intriguing, isn't it? I'll leave your question unanswered, specimen, to give you something to ponder."

traits.locale_text: {n}Görebildiğin Haimonkuluslar konuşmuyor ama Tervantias'ın cevabını yine de duyuyorsun. Sesi aynı anda her yönden geliyormuş gibi.{/n} "Yeni, çoklu formum ne enteresan, değil mi? Soruna cevap vermiyorum numune. Düşün, kendin bul."
traits.speaker: Haemonculus
